name: Festival Dumplings
tooltip:
Festival Dumplings

If you are hungry, then you have come to the right place my friend!

Dumplings are the traditional food of the Lunar Festival; it has been served since the time of the first Lunar Festival, and I am pleased to be able to offer it at this one.  In exchange for just a single coin of ancestry, I will share with you a sampling of one of the tastiest dishes you will ever enjoy!

Requirements:
- Coin of Ancestry
